channel.title: Jordan Brand on Ray's Blog - Wear Your Shoes
channel.description: Recent content in Jordan Brand on Ray's Blog - Wear Your Shoes

item.title: Jordan Melo M13
item.description: These have a unique diamond patterned upper, but support feels flimsy. Only worn casually thus far, but traction pattern doesn’t seem great for quick movements. I like the look of these, but doesn’t seem to be a good performance shoe, especially for shifty players.
